name: ORORATECH GMBH
description: Company manufactures low earth orbit satellites designed to map wildfire activity.
sampleDescriptions: Provide education and outreach to Congress and federal agencies on the use of early wildfire detection via thermal satellite technology.
Provide education and outreach to Congress and federal agencies on the use of early wildfire detection via thermal satellite technology.

H.R. 471, Fix Our Forests Act; S. 1462, Fix Our Forests Act; S. 902, Wildfire Response and Preparedness Act; H.R. 527, The Strengthening Wildfire Resiliency Through Satellites Act; FY26 Interior & Env
